newgames.title: Cyberpunk 2077
newgames.description: Explore the dystopian open world of Night City in this highly anticipated RPG.

newgames.title: The Last of Us Part II
newgames.description: Experience an emotional and intense story of survival in a post-apocalyptic world.

newgames.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla

newgames.title: Hades

newgames.title: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales
